DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study identify vitamin D3 supplementation influence VO2max athlete . Secondary aim determine vitamin D3 supplementation impact measure muscle function , lung function , body composition , immune function self-reported incidence upper respiratory tract infection . This double-blind , randomise , placebo-controlled trial parallel design aim recruit total 50 athlete randomise either placebo treatment group 12-week intervention .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Vitamin D Supplementation Aerobic Fitness Athletes
DOC.criteria: Athletes whose sport primarily consist anaerobic component Apparently healthy Over age 18 Resting arterial hypertension Individuals athlete University/local sport team Athletes predominantly utilise anaerobic energy system Athletes age 18 Those consume supplement contain vitamin D ( great 400IU/day ) iron supplement 30 day prior start study Those health condition identify screen questionnaire Individuals prescribe medication know affect vitamin D metabolism Those follow vegan diet Those physical disability would prevent successful completion exercise test Those either sun holiday 4 week prior start study Those plan sun holiday intervention period
